## Checklist

<!-- Check all that apply before submitting -->

- [ ] I have tested the site locally (optional but recommended)
- [ ] All images have descriptive alt text
- [ ] Images are optimized (under 500KB each)
- [ ] All links have been tested and work
- [ ] Spelling has been checked
- [ ] Changes follow the site's design guidelines

## Additional Notes

<!-- Any additional information that reviewers should know -->

---

## Automated Checks

The following automated workflows will run:
- CI - Quality Checks
- Jekyll Build Test
- Linting
- Link Checker
- Accessibility Testing
- Spell Check
- Image Optimization (if images changed)
- Security Scanning

These checks help ensure quality and catch common issues. Don't worry if you see warnings - they're informational and won't block the PR.

**Questions about the workflows?** See [WORKFLOW-GUIDE.md](.github/WORKFLOW-GUIDE.md)
